original_title: Get Ripped! with Jari Love: Get Ripped to the Core
overview: Take a deep breath, you're going to need it! To achieve the same results, you'd have to run a 5K race. This complete workout includes 9 compound exercises plus an ab and stretching segment.  Get triple the workout in the same amount of time. This workout guarantees faster results by working multiple muscle groups simultaneously.
title: Get Ripped! with Jari Love: Get Ripped to the Core
